attributes.action: Ban the UK from viewing the disgusting video on the internet called 3 men 1 hammer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a video online on the internet about a sick and disgusting video about a brutal murder of 3 sick men brutally killing a man with a hammer and then stabbing him with a screw driver in the stomach and then on the eye.

The men in question on this video are jailed but one of the brutally videos made by them had a leak and now it's easily accessible on the net!

This petition is to ban atleast the UK to not watch some disgusting and brutal murder!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
